To clarify a bit on the "Kunitomo" tsuba, I owned that one for a number of
=
years. I bought it from Skip Holbrook, and that's where the attribution cam=
e
from, I think because of the sahari inlay work reminding one of similar w=
ork
by the Kunitomo gunsmiths. No one who saw this tsuba, Jim Gilbert, Bob
=
Haynes, etc. could think of anything better to call it. I'm pretty sure tha=
t
Bob said he did not recognize the kao.

No papers, unless Elliot has take=
n that step ... it would be interesting to
see what 'box' the experts would=
 put it in.

Craig
